name: part_003
file: tmp_【 重大告知あり‼ 】#鷹嶺ルイ2周年LIVE 『ANIMAL』【3D LIVE】 [oU85vmx7jn8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Takane Lui performs the song 'Uma to Shika' (Horse and Deer) by Kenshi Yonezu.
MC section where Takane Lui greets the audience and explains the theme of her 2nd anniversary live.

subtitles.original: これが愛じゃなければ
subtitles.english: If this isn't love,

subtitles.original: 何と呼ぶのか 僕は知らなかった
subtitles.english: what do I call it? I didn't know.

subtitles.original: 呼べよ 花の名前を
subtitles.english: Call it, a flower's name,

subtitles.original: ただ一つだけ
subtitles.english: just one.

subtitles.original: 張り裂けるくらいに
subtitles.english: As if it's about to burst.

subtitles.original: 鼻先が触れる
subtitles.english: Our noses touch,

subtitles.original: 呼吸が止まる
subtitles.english: our breaths stop.

subtitles.original: 痛みは消えないままでいい
subtitles.english: The pain is fine just as it is.

subtitles.original: 疲れたその目で 何を言う
subtitles.english: What do you say with those tired eyes?

subtitles.original: 傷跡隠して 歩いた
subtitles.english: Hiding your scars, you walked.

subtitles.original: そのくせ 影をばらまいた
subtitles.english: Yet, you scattered shadows.

subtitles.original: 気づいてほしかった
subtitles.english: I wanted you to notice.

subtitles.original: また歩けるか 噛み締めた砂の味
subtitles.english: Can I walk again? The taste of sand I chewed.

subtitles.original: 夜露で濡れた 芝生の上
subtitles.english: On the grass wet with night dew.

subtitles.original: 逸る胸に 尋ねる言葉
subtitles.english: Words asked to my racing heart.

subtitles.original: 終わるには まだ早いだろう
subtitles.english: It's too early to end, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 誰もが正しまるように
subtitles.english: So that everyone would be correct,

subtitles.original: 微笑むことが上手く出来なかった
subtitles.english: I couldn't smile well.

subtitles.original: ひとつだに ひとつでいい 守れるだけで
subtitles.english: Just one, just one is fine, if I can just protect it.

subtitles.original: それでよかったのに
subtitles.english: That would have been enough.

subtitles.original: あまりにくだらない願いが消えない
subtitles.english: This so foolish wish won't disappear.

subtitles.original: 誰にも奪えない魂
subtitles.english: A soul that no one can take away.

subtitles.original: 何に例えよう 君と僕を
subtitles.english: What shall I compare us to?

subtitles.original: 踵に残る 似た傷を
subtitles.english: To the similar scars remaining on our heels.

subtitles.original: 晴れ間を呼べば まだ続く
subtitles.english: If we call for the sunlight, it will still continue.

subtitles.original: 行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go.

subtitles.original: 花も咲かないうちに
subtitles.english: Before even the flowers bloom.

subtitles.original: これが愛じゃなければ
subtitles.english: If this isn't love,

subtitles.original: 何と呼ぶのか 僕は知らなかった
subtitles.english: what do I call it? I didn't know.

subtitles.original: 呼べよ 恐れるままに
subtitles.english: Call it, as you are afraid,

subtitles.original: 花の名前を
subtitles.english: the flower's name.

subtitles.original: 君じゃなきゃダメだと
subtitles.english: That it had to be you.

subtitles.original: 鼻先が触れる
subtitles.english: Our noses touch,

subtitles.original: 呼吸が止まる
subtitles.english: our breaths stop.

subtitles.original: 痛みは消えないままでいい
subtitles.english: The pain is fine just as it is.

subtitles.original: あまりにくだらない願いが消えない
subtitles.english: This so foolish wish won't disappear.

subtitles.original: 止まない
subtitles.english: It won't stop.

subtitles.original: はい、ということで、4曲連続で聴いていただきました！
subtitles.english: Yes, and with that, you've listened to four songs in a row!

subtitles.original: 皆様、待ったかね！
subtitles.english: Everyone, wait for me!

subtitles.original: ホロックスの女幹部、鷹嶺ルイと申します！
subtitles.english: I am Takane Lui, the female executive of HoloX!

subtitles.original: 2周年だー！イェイイェイイェイイェイ！
subtitles.english: It's the 2nd anniversary! Yay yay yay yay!

subtitles.original: あ、ダンサーさんもありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Oh, thank you to the dancers too!

subtitles.original: はい、ということでね、ちょっと息を整えたいんだけど…
subtitles.english: Yes, and so, I want to catch my breath a bit, but...

subtitles.original: …いける！
subtitles.english: ...I can do it!

subtitles.original: ということで、鷹嶺ルイ2周年ライブ『ANIMAL』が始まりましたー！
subtitles.english: And so, Takane Lui's 2nd anniversary live "ANIMAL" has begun!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 皆様、楽しんでおりますでしょうか！
subtitles.english: Is everyone enjoying themselves?

subtitles.original: 今回もね、あの、ハッシュタグございますので。あ、こっちかな？
subtitles.english: This time too, um, we have a hashtag. Oh, is it this way?

subtitles.original: こっちかな？ここにありますので。
subtitles.english: Is it this way? It's right here.

subtitles.original: よかったらたくさんポストしてください！
subtitles.english: Please post a lot if you'd like!

subtitles.original: ちゃんと「ポスト」って言えました。
subtitles.english: I managed to say "post" properly.

subtitles.original: はい、ということでね、今回『ANIMAL』というタイトルをライブに使わせてもらったんですけど。
subtitles.english: Yes, and so, this time I used the title "ANIMAL" for the live.

subtitles.original: まあ、その意味もね、まあ後々わかると思うのです。
subtitles.english: Well, the meaning behind that, well, I think you'll understand later.

subtitles.original: 『ANIMAL』ね、ちょっと皆様もお気づきかと思いますが、
subtitles.english: About "ANIMAL," I think some of you might have noticed already, but...

subtitles.original: なんと、曲名すべてね、動物の名前が入っている曲を歌わせてもらっております！
subtitles.english: Unbelievably, I'm singing songs where all the titles include animal names!
